name: westpoint WLX2021P Top Load Washer 20KG
description: westpoint WLX2021P is a heavy-duty 20 kg top-load fully automatic washing machine.  It includes multiple wash cycles and LED display, designed for large loads. (White finish.)
specifications:
Capacity: 20 kg  
Drum Material: Stainless steel  
Wash Programs: Heavy, Normal, Delicate, Quick, Eco  
Control Panel: LED display with touchpad and rotary selectors  
Motor Type: Direct drive inverter motor
warrantyDetails: Coverage Period: 3 months | What’s Covered: Complete electronic unit | Exclusions: Physical damage by consumer, unless otherwise specified
